# Shyara Digital — Full Information

> Invite with Love, Share with Joy

## About Shyara Digital

Shyara Digital is a digital invitation design studio that creates beautiful, custom invitation cards and videos for weddings, celebrations, and special moments. Every invitation is individually designed by a creative team — not auto-generated from templates. The business is based in Patna, Bihar, India, but serves clients worldwide with no geographic restrictions.

Website: https://digital.shyara.co.in
A brand by Shyara Tech Solutions.

## Detailed Services

### 1. Digital Invitation Videos
Custom-designed video invitations in 9:16 vertical format, optimized for WhatsApp, Instagram Stories, and social media sharing. Each video features custom animations, music, and personalized text. Delivery within 24-48 hours. Rush orders available.

### 2. PDF Invitation Cards
High-quality static invitation cards delivered as PDFs, suitable for printing or digital sharing.

### 3. Custom Invitation Websites
Full-featured wedding websites built from scratch for each client. Features include:
- Personalized guest links — every guest receives a unique URL with their name
- Themed event pages — separate pages for Mehndi, Baraat, Wedding Ceremony, Reception, each with custom colors and animations
- Smart RSVP system — guests can RSVP per event, specify number of attendees, and choose menu preferences (vegetarian/non-vegetarian), all tracked in real time
- Admin dashboard — manage guest lists, view RSVP statistics per event, import/export guest data via Excel, send bulk invitations
- Photo gallery — with lightbox viewer
- Venue & travel info — Google Maps integration, airport details, shuttle information
- Save the Date timeline — elegant vertical timeline with all events
- WhatsApp & email sharing — share personalized invitation links via WhatsApp with pre-filled messages, or send email invitations in bulk
- Mobile-first responsive design with smooth animations
- Demo available at: https://digital.shyara.co.in/invitation-website/demo

## Event Types — Full List

### Wedding Invitations
- All Events Combined (complete wedding invitation package covering all ceremonies)
- Save the Date
- Engagement / Sagai
- Mehndi Ceremony
- Haldi Ceremony
- Sangeet Night
- Wedding / Vivah Ceremony
- Baraat
- Reception

### Pooja & Religious Invitations
- Grih Pravesh (housewarming)
- Jagran (night of devotion)
- Mata Ki Chowki (divine blessings)
- Ram Katha (sacred storytelling)
- Bhagwat Katha (spiritual discourse)

### Birthday Invitations
- Milestone birthdays: 18th, 21st, 25th, 30th, 40th, 50th, 60+
- Kids' birthdays

### Other Celebrations
- Anniversaries
- Ring Ceremony / Roka
- Proposals
- Valentine's Day
- Godh Bharai (baby shower)
- Mundan (first haircut ceremony)
- Namkaran (naming ceremony)
- Father's Day, Mother's Day, Children's Day, Friendship Day

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How long does it take to create an invitation?
A: Most invitations are ready within 24-48 hours after you share your details. Rush orders can be delivered faster.

Q: What details do you need from me?
A: Event details (date, time, venue), names of hosts/couple, theme or color preferences, and photos if desired. The team guides you through everything.

Q: Can I request changes after seeing the first design?
A: Yes. Revisions are offered to ensure complete satisfaction.

Q: How do I share the invitation with my guests?
A: Final files (video or PDF) can be shared via WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Email, iMessage, or any platform.

Q: Do you create invitations for international clients and destination weddings?
A: Yes. Invitations are created for families celebrating worldwide. There is no geographic restriction.

Q: What if I have a unique or custom request?
A: Custom themes, special animations, or unique concepts are all welcome.

Q: How much does a digital wedding invitation cost?
A: Pricing is affordable and varies based on complexity. Contact for a personalized quote.

Q: Can I add music or songs to my invitation video?
A: Yes. Custom background music or specific songs can be added to any video invitation.

Q: Do you create invitations in languages other than English?
A: Yes. Invitations can be created in Hindi, English, or a combination of both. Other languages can be accommodated on request.

Q: Can I use my own photos and videos in the invitation?
A: Absolutely. Personal photos and video clips are encouraged and can be incorporated into the design.

Q: What file formats do you deliver?
A: Videos are delivered in MP4 format (9:16 vertical). Cards are delivered as high-resolution PDFs.

Q: Can I get a sample before ordering?
A: Yes. Browse the sample gallery at https://digital.shyara.co.in/samples to see previous work.

## Business Details

- Business Name: Shyara Digital
- Parent Company: Shyara Tech Solutions
- Location: Patna, Bihar, India
- Service Area: Worldwide (no geographic restriction)
- Languages: English, Hindi
- Operating Hours: Monday-Sunday, 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM IST
- Price Range: Affordable ($$)
- Payment Methods: UPI, Bank Transfer, Cash
- Statistics: 500+ happy families, 1000+ invitations created, 50+ event types, 4.9/5 rating
